original_text: They have helped me to feel stronger, as they also did for you. You should recognize the authority of people like them.
korean_text: 그들이 나와 너희 마음을 시원하게 하였으니 그러므로 너희는 이런 사람들을 알아 주라

sentences.original_text: They have helped me to feel stronger
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 내가 더 강하게 느끼도록 도왔습니다

sentences.original_text: as they also did for you
